scenes.action_text: BLITZ Written by Steve McQueen 9th July, 2022 PRE-LAP: The distant sound of humming begins, gradually getting louder. TITLE CARD: For eight months between September 1940 and May 1941, Nazi Germany undertook an intense bombing campaign against the United Kingdom. Dubbed `The Blitz,' the term originated from the German `blitzkrieg' meaning lightning war. In response, the British government initiated the evacuation of more than 1.5 million people fro
